entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
